channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Tyson-Paul bout gives Netflix opportunity to show it can handle big events with NFL, WWE on horizon
item.description: Jake Paul and Mike Tyson aren’t the only ones who have high stakes when they meet in the boxing ring on Friday night.

item.title: The last actions the Biden administration will take before Trump takes over the White House
item.description: Biden administration officials are working against the clock doling out billions in grants and taking other steps to try to preserve at least some of the outgoing president’s legacy before President-elect Donald Trump takes office in January.

item.title: California man to be sentenced for hate crime in the killing of a gay college student
item.description: A California man convicted of stabbing to death a gay University of Pennsylvania student in an act of hate is expected to be sentenced to life in prison.
